an5.22:4.1: “Mendicants, it’s simply impossible that a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with incompatible lifestyle could fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.22:4.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.22:4.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.
an5.22:4.4: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of samādhi.
an5.22:4.5: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of samādhi, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.
an5.22:5.1: But it is possible that a respectful and reverent mendicant with compatible lifestyle could fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.22:5.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.22:5.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.
an5.22:5.4: Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of samādhi.
an5.22:5.5: Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of samādhi, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.”
